A '''granite wall''' is a [[granite]] variant of a [[wall]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Granite walls can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{breaking row
|Granite Wall
|Pickaxe
|Wooden
|item=1
|link=none
|horizontal=1
}}

=== Natural generation ===
[[File:Desert Armorer 1.png|thumb|An isometric render of a desert village armorer building.]]
Each [[Village/Structure#Desert biome structure variants|desert village armorer building]] generates with 2 granite walls as the top part of its chimney.
